entries.name: test-runner-specialist
entries.description: Execute test suites and analyze coverage for code validation. Use when running tests, measuring coverage, or validating test quality. Ensures ≥80% coverage threshold.

entries.name: security-specialist
entries.description: Security assessment specialist for evaluating code against OWASP Top 10 and security best practices. Use when security validation, vulnerability assessment, or OWASP compliance checks are needed.

entries.name: dependency-manager
entries.description: Sub-agent for Phase 2 design that analyzes project dependencies, identifies new requirements, checks version compatibility, detects conflicts, and assesses security vulnerabilities. Executes in parallel with Architecture Designer and Documentation Researcher.

entries.name: documentation-researcher
entries.description: Sub-agent for fetching and analyzing library/framework documentation using context7 and fetch MCPs for comprehensive documentation research.

entries.name: unit-test-specialist
entries.description: Specialist agent for generating comprehensive unit tests. Generates pytest tests for Python and Jest tests for JavaScript/TypeScript following project conventions and best practices.

entries.name: code-quality-specialist
entries.description: Execute language-specific code quality checks for Python, TypeScript, and Rust. Use when validating code quality standards, formatting, linting, type checking, and security.

entries.name: architecture-designer
entries.description: Sub-agent for designing component architecture, data models, and API contracts using deep reasoning with ultrathink mode.

entries.name: integration-test-specialist
entries.description: Specialist agent for generating comprehensive integration tests. Generates tests for API endpoints, database interactions, and multi-component workflows.

entries.name: design-orchestrator
entries.description: Coordinates parallel design activities by orchestrating Architecture Designer, Documentation Researcher, and Dependency Manager sub-agents to produce comprehensive Product Requirements Prompts (PRPs).

entries.name: e2e-accessibility-specialist
entries.description: End-to-end testing and accessibility specialist using Playwright. Use when E2E testing, accessibility validation, or WCAG compliance checks are needed.

entries.name: deployment-specialist
entries.description: Specialist for finalizing features with documentation updates, CHANGELOG generation, and PR creation. Use after validation phase to deploy features with comprehensive documentation.

entries.name: validation-orchestrator
entries.description: Coordinates sequential validation specialists with recursive communication to ensure code quality, test coverage, and security compliance before deployment.

entries.name: analysis-specialist
entries.description: Analyzes GitHub issues to extract requirements, assess security risks, and evaluate technical stack compatibility for feature implementation.
